#summary Java link program to SDK Flex Compiler

MBCompiler is a small Java console program that receives commands from MiniBuilder and hand them over to Flex SDK. It can also run some native system commands.

In order to be able to compile ActionScript projects with MiniBuilder, you need to have the MBCompiler console running.
